articles.author: Kate Abnett, Riham Alkousaa
articles.title: Majority of recent CO2 emissions linked to just 57 producers, report says - Reuters
articles.description: The vast majority of planet-warming carbon dioxide emissions since 2016 can be traced to a group of 57 fossil fuel and cement producers, researchers said on Thursday.

articles.author: Harry Dempsey
articles.title: Gold hits new high as investors seek hedge against stubborn inflation - Financial Times
articles.description: Price of metal climbs to record of $2,295 a troy ounce
articles.content: Gold prices surged to an all-time high on Wednesday as traders responded to signals that the US Federal Reserve was preparing to cut interest rates later this year even as inflation remained stubborn… [+3127 chars]
